name: Web Em Up
description:
Web Em Up is an arcade game where the player is a jumping spider. Your mission is to create webs in order to catch flies. However, as you have a limited amount of energy to create webs, you'll need to eat flies in order to replenish your energy. But watch out! There are also dangers to your home! Bees and birds have the ability to hurt you, so watch out! Have fun!

This game is participating in the GMTK Game Jam 2021
